column5: Does anyone have any reports on Oak Lake? We are heading up in 2 weeks looking for the lunkers. Anything will help our excitement!!

Oak Lake on the English River above Maynard Lake? I know some people that just got back from that area (below Maynard Falls) and said fishing was the best they've seen in 20+ yearsIf this is the same system you are going to, let me know how you do as I will be up there in 4 weeks
